title: CYPHER
description: Calling out all high-octane hip-hop dancers! Once you step in, there's no going back. Diss your opponent, not with your words but with your dance. Steal the spotlight with your swings and rap steps.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
rules: This event has four consecutive rounds: Round 1 (Prelims), Round 2 (Qualifiers), Round 3 (Semi-Finals) and Round 4 (Finals)
Maximum time limit of 50 seconds will be given for each participant.
Any form of vulgarity will lead to disqualification.
The battle will be freestyle and on the spot.
The finals will be judged based on performance scores from the three previous rounds
The Judgesâ€™ decisions will be final.
